definitions.body: old race of giants (perh. = I. ´[[ר]]:, as extinct and powerless; v. esp. WRS in Dr:De 2:11; or as shadowy, vaguely known, Schwally:ZAW xviii (1898), 127 ff. v. also Sta:l.c.);—ancient inhab. of Canaan [W. of Jordan?], Ge 15:20, Jos 17:15 (JE), cf. 1Ch 20:4 (v. II. [[רָפָה]] supr.); hence ´[[עֶמֶמק ר]]:, plain S. of Jerus. 2Sa 5:18, 2Sa 5:22, 2Sa 23:13, 1Ch 11:15, 1Ch 14:9, Is 17:5, Jos 15:8, Jos 18:16 (P); ´[[ר]]: E. of Jordan De 2:11 (‖[[עֲנׇקִים ]]; tall, cf. v:De 2:10), v:De 2:20 (‖ id.; tall; = Zamzummim); in Bashan, Ge 14:5, Og the last of them De 3:11 (of huge size), Jos 12:4, Jos 13:12 (D); ´[[אֶרֶץ ר]]: De 2:20, De 3:13.
